short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to render a OPEN API 3 REST Documentation uploading the JSON File

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Swagger UI Alternative Open Source.

You can attach a JSON that satisfies the specification Open API 3 and the documentation will be rendered.

This extension is focused in front-end and back-end developers who need read a lot of times REST API documentations in order to use it while your are coding. So with this extension you don't need to open another tab to read the API documentation website.

Features:

- The doc will show you the last section you was reading automatically
- Search easy the sections with a modal like box
- You can upload new docs

This extension do not make any kind of server requests.
The extension is Open Source: 
https://github.com/CharlyJazz/prettyrestdoc
You can see the web mode of the extension here: 
https://charlyjazz.github.io/prettyrestdoc/
